text: Gigantoscorpio willsi is an extinct species of scorpion which lived between 345.0million and 342.8million years ago, during the Visean age of the Carboniferous. Its type specimen is BMNH In. 42706a,b, In. 42707, which is a 3D body fossil of its exoskeleton found near modern-day United Kingdom. It grew up to around 1.3 ft (40 cm) long. == References == Category:Carboniferous arthropods of Europe Category:Carboniferous arachnids Category:Prehistoric scorpions Category:Fossil taxa described in 1963
title: Gigantoscorpio
